video.title: Kitchen Nightmares (U.S.)
video.synopsis: Chef Gordon Ramsay visits failing restaurants, pinpoints their problems and whips the errant cooks, waitstaff and owners into shape.

episodes.synopsis: A married couple with a background in construction open a restaurant in Queens, N.Y., but neither has experience in the food service industry.
episodes.title: PJ's Steakhouse

episodes.synopsis: Chef Ramsay visits Spanish Pavillion in Harrison, N.J., where a family legacy is on the line.
episodes.title: Spanish Pavillion

episodes.synopsis: Chef Ramsay visits a restaurant in suburban West Babylon, N.Y., where two inexperienced owners are struggling to make ends meet with mounting debt.
episodes.title: Classic American

episodes.synopsis: Chef Ramsay visits Grasshopper Also, an Irish pub in Carlstadt, N.J., that is suffering from mismanagement.
episodes.title: Grasshopper Also

episodes.synopsis: Chef Ramsey visits a Boston restaurant whose owners are brothers with some bad blood between them.
episodes.title: Davide

episodes.synopsis: Chef Ramsey deals with a restaurant owner who refuses to believe that anything is wrong with the food and menu.
episodes.title: DownCity

episodes.synopsis: The owners of a restaurant in Bridgeport, Conn., choose to be uninvolved with the business, monitoring operations via closed-circuit television.
episodes.title: Café Tavolini

episodes.synopsis: A brother and sister disagree on how to run the French restaurant they are inheriting from their father.
episodes.title: La Frite

episodes.synopsis: Chef Ramsey helps a couple lazy twin brothers get their act together in order to save their failing restaurant in Los Angeles.
episodes.title: Capri

episodes.synopsis: A mother and son disagree on the direction of their Jamaican restaurant, Kingston Café in Pasadena, Calif.
episodes.title: Kingston Café

episodes.synopsis: The new owners of a restaurant that was affected by Hurricane Katrina have raised prices while lowering quality.
episodes.title: Zeke's

episodes.synopsis: Chef Ramsay faces one of his most volatile challenges in New Orleans, where two brothers are using their restaurant as a battleground.
episodes.title: Oceana

episodes.synopsis: Chef Ramsay returns to restaurants from the previous season -- Mojito, Flamangos and Bazzini -- to see if they've implemented positive changes.
episodes.title: Revisited, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Chef Ramsay returns to restaurants from the previous season -- Le Bistro, Anna Vincenzo's and Lido di Manhattan -- to see if they've improved.
episodes.title: Revisited, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Dead mice, bland food, and a chef who relies on a wok and a pizza oven await Chef Ramsey at a Plainfield, N.J., soul food restaurant.
episodes.title: Blackberry's

episodes.synopsis: After a three-year absence for a devastating illness, a woman returns to her Italian restaurant to find that her son is letting the business collapse.
episodes.title: Leone's

episodes.synopsis: When his father dies, Mike, the sole owner of an Oakhurst, N.J., steakhouse, is overcome by alcohol and depression until Chef Ramsey arrives.
episodes.title: Mike and Nellie's

episodes.synopsis: A father-son feud, lousy food, and a disco mood are among the problems at a Greek eatery seeking Gordon Ramsey's help in getting its vibe back.
episodes.title: Greek at the Harbor

episodes.synopsis: The owner's high-strung wife, squabbling grown children and $1.5 million debt threaten to sink an Italian eatery in Anaheim, Calif.
episodes.title: Luigi's

episodes.synopsis: Ramsey visits an L.A. burger joint whose owner offsets monthly losses with his son's inheritance and blames poor business on an online conspiracy.
episodes.title: Burger Kitchen, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Chef Ramsey proves to Burger Kitchen owner Alan that the Internet's not out to get him and encourages him to trust his son Daniel to take the reins.
episodes.title: Burger Kitchen, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Chef Ramsey confronts a young chef who relies on the microwave and only works three hours a day at the Greek restaurant he owns with his mother.
episodes.title: El Greco

episodes.synopsis: At an Alabama smokehouse, Chef Ramsey is appalled to find the daughter of the ailing owner unwilling to help run the family business.
episodes.title: Michon's

episodes.synopsis: A public relations faux pas turned customers away from Atlanta's Park's Edge. Can Chef Ramsey change the restaurant's image with the locals?
episodes.title: Park's Edge

episodes.synopsis: Chef Ramsey visits Davide, Downcity and Classic American to check on their progress since appearing on the show and offer some new suggestions.
episodes.title: Revisited #1

episodes.synopsis: Chef Ramsey returns to restaurants featured in earlier episodes to check their progress -- or lack thereof -- since his original visit.
episodes.title: Revisited #2

episodes.synopsis: Chef Ramsey tries to breathe new life into a 50-year-old steakhouse -- once a Fremont, Calif., favorite -- whose married owners have become desperate.
episodes.title: Spin a Yarn

episodes.synopsis: At a La Verne, a California Italian bistro, Chef Ramsey discovers that the well-meaning waitress-turned-owner has no clue how to run a restaurant.
episodes.title: Charlie's

episodes.synopsis: Chef Ramsey confronts an owner who alienated staff, customers, and the entire community when she copyrighted the word "Hon" and turned litigious.
episodes.title: Café Hon

episodes.synopsis: A Philadelphia eatery is turning off patrons with an outdated menu, and Chef Ramsey is forced to give the husband-and-wife owners a reality check.
episodes.title: Chiarella's

episodes.synopsis: Chef Ramsey tries to sort out the problems at Zocalo, a Mexican restaurant in West Philadelphia, before it destroys its owners' marriage.
episodes.title: Zocalo
